torso.transformationDescription:
After just a few moments, the transformation comes to an end, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a deep sigh as the itching finally stops, leaving [npc.her] torso covered with fluffy, sheep-like wool. Although it's relatively close-cropped and smooth over [npc.her] stomach and [npc.breasts], there's a decent amount of it covering all other parts of [npc.her] torso.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldSheep(sheep-like)], [npc.skinFullDescription].
